name: Save the President (FakeFlop)
description:
The president has been captured by aliens, and you are the only one with enough courage to save him.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot

Goal: Complete all 7 rooms and save the president without dying.

Environment art and medal (at winning scene) is from an asset pack downloaded from Kenney.nl

Sound effects are from OpenGameArt.org

Music is made by me :D
